stanzas: Search me, O God, and know my heart try me and know my thoughts, and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
Search me, O God, and know my heart try me and know my thoughts, and see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
